name: 9 Holes
description:
Do you love playing cards? Do you love golf? If you answered 'yes' to one or both of these questions then this is the app for you!

Ask and ye shall receive! Many of you have asked for a multiplayer feature and we have delivered. You can now play against your friends from across the globe!!

9 Holes is the highly addicting game of golf that uses cards. Each player gets 8 cards, you try to pair up all the cards in your hand, and the lowest score wins. No more wasting time shuffling cards. 9 Holes is fast, fun and exciting!

Features Include:
*2-4 Players
*Play against up to 3 AI players at a time
*Custom high resolution card designs to take advantage of Retina displays
*Optimized for iOS 5+
*Track your 20 high scores
*Intuitive Drag and Drop controls
*Game Center integration for playing against your friends
